Text:
Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for your patience!
Who is worthy of being Santa?! The Saint Selection
Ceremony beauty contest is about to commence!
Whoaaaaa!

Now then, contestants... Please make your way to the
stage!
Wait... No way! Isn't that Princess Iris?!

And next to her is the famed "Goddess of War,"
Beatrix! I can't believe we're seeing her outside of
the Bushin Festivalâ€”we're in for a real treat today!

Ladies and gentlemen, it appears you're as stunned
as I am by our star-studded surprise participants!
Frankly, I'm over the moon!

I thought I had become used to being watched at the
Bushin Festival, but this feels strangely different.

Yes, I know what you mean. I'm a little...no,
extremely nervous...!

Now, let's proceed to the first evaluation! First up,
the staple of such contestsâ€”the beauty showcase!
Beauty showcase...?

How you showcase your beauty is entirely up to you!
Let's kick things off with contestant number 1!

What is she...doing? The announcer mentioned a
showcase, but...

I think she's showcasing her elegant walk to the
audience. That's just a guess, though...

Just walking? No need to draw a sword or display any
techniques?

Judging by the atmosphere here, that doesn't seem
necessary.

True... What should I showcase, then? Other than my
martial skills, what else do I have to show?

For starters, the criteria for "beauty" in this
contest seems ambiguous. What kind of "beauty"
is worthy of the seasonâ€”and fitting for Santa?
An impressive walk! Next up, contestant number 2!
Hmm... A dance, huh?
It certainly is beautiful, but...

As Iris and Beatrix express their uncertainty, the
other contestants complete their showcases. Finally,
the moment arrives...

Thank you for waiting! Coming up next is the
"Goddess of War"! Lady Beatrix, please grace
the stage with your presence!
Lady Beatrix...

I'm alright. Well, I feel a bit anxious, but I just
need to showcase something beautiful to the
audience, right?
Y-Yes, I believe that's the idea...

What will Lady Beatrix do? A sword dance or maybe
some kinda traditional elven performance...?
That's strange... She isn't moving at all.

What's the meaning of this? Lady Beatrix hasn't moved
an inch!

(Without so much as a smile or a pose. What could she
be thinking...?)

Facing a bewildered Iris and the audience, Beatrix
suddenly begins to whistle. And thenâ€”
Oh...look! Little birds are flocking to her...!

Incredible! Drawn by her whistling, small birds are
landing on Lady Beatrix's shoulders and arms!

(Not just that. The birds surrounding her are
fluttering so joyously... What a sight to behold...)
How divine...like witnessing a live painting.

This is the embodiment of "beauty" unique to an elf
who loves nature!

I...may not possess an innate beauty that captivates
others. However, like many here, I have a heart
capable of feeling "beauty."

The freedom of these birds is one form of "beauty" I
know. I wanted to convey that.

Magnificent! What a marvelous showcase, ensnaring
the audience's attention with her unique take! Who
would have thought the "Goddess of War" was also
a goddess of beauty!

(Well played, Lady Beatrix... I can't let myself be
outdone.)

Now, the moment we've all been waiting for! It's time
for the Crown Princess of Midgar's showcase! Princess
Iris, please take the stage!
R-Right!

(...What should I do? I'm not the type to flash a
sweet smile or pose alluringly like the other
contestants.)

(And I can't perform like Beatrix did.
So, the "beauty" I can convey is...)

Eeek! I can't believe I'm seeing her so up close...!
I wonder what she's gonna showcase...!

Ladies and gentlemen, today, I...Iris Midgar, wish to
use this platform to make a pledge to all of you.
A pledge...? Here?

This is quite the unexpected turn of events!
What kind of declaration will she make?!

I, Iris Midgar, swear to love, cherish, and respect
all the people living in this land!

Though royalty may stand at the head of a nation, I
firmly believe...our citizens do not stand beneath us.

The nation is its people! Can a nation prosper
without its citizens being happy?

Absolutely not! The prosperity of a nation is directly
linked to the happiness and well-being of its
citizens. As royalty, it is our solemn duty to ensure
this!

I pledge to fulfill my role as your princess, guiding
our nation and its people towards happiness...!

(All I can offer is my heartfelt dedication to our
nation and its people!)

My... It's as if we're witnessing a glimpse of her
future coronation ceremony...

Ohh... Long live Princess Iris! Long live Princess
Iris!

Hear the chorus of cheers erupting from the venue!
What an unexpected twist! I can't hold back my
tears...!

Hehe. Well done, Princess Iris. What an eloquent
speech.

And so, both Iris and Beatrix advance to the next
round of the contest...
